page.title: 19Arts Festival Music Concert
page.content: As part of the annual Dumfries festival, I attended a cushion concert by the Trio Zingara. There was a pianist, a violinist and a cellist, providing classical music of an excellent standard. However I was the only pupil from Primary 7 who attended the Trio Zingara's concert. This is because nowadays classical music is not popular, and is considered out of date. At the end, the audience were invited to ask questions about the trio as they pleased. The concert took place at the Academy Hall in Dumfries, which is not far from my school. Altogether I found it a most enjoyable afternoon.
